    private final CyclicBarrier
    writeMemStoreAgainStartCyclicBarrier
    Only the snapshot thread retry CompactingMemStore.swapPipelineWithNull(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.VersionedSegmentsList), writeAgain thread could start.

    • TAKE_SNAPSHOT_THREAD_NAME

      private static final String TAKE_SNAPSHOT_THREAD_NAME
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • WRITE_AGAIN_THREAD_NAME

      private static final String WRITE_AGAIN_THREAD_NAME
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • flattenOneSegmentPreCyclicBarrier

      private final CyclicBarrier flattenOneSegmentPreCyclicBarrier
      CompactingMemStore.flattenOneSegment(long, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.MemStoreCompactionStrategy.Action) must execute after CompactingMemStore.getImmutableSegments()

    • flattenOneSegmentPostCyclicBarrier

      private final CyclicBarrier flattenOneSegmentPostCyclicBarrier
      Only after CompactingMemStore.flattenOneSegment(long, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.MemStoreCompactionStrategy.Action) completed, CompactingMemStore.swapPipelineWithNull(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.VersionedSegmentsList) could execute.

    • snapShotStartCyclicCyclicBarrier

      private final CyclicBarrier snapShotStartCyclicCyclicBarrier
      Only the in memory compact thread enters CompactingMemStore.flattenOneSegment(long, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.MemStoreCompactionStrategy.Action),the snapshot thread starts CompactingMemStore.snapshot(),because CompactingMemStore.snapshot() would invoke CompactingMemStore.stopCompaction().

    • inMemoryCompactionEndCyclicBarrier

      private final CyclicBarrier inMemoryCompactionEndCyclicBarrier
      To wait for CompactingMemStore.InMemoryCompactionRunnable stopping.

    • getImmutableSegmentsListCounter

      private final AtomicInteger getImmutableSegmentsListCounter

    • swapPipelineWithNullCounter

      private final AtomicInteger swapPipelineWithNullCounter

    • flattenOneSegmentCounter

      private final AtomicInteger flattenOneSegmentCounter

    • setInMemoryCompactionFlagCounter

      private final AtomicInteger setInMemoryCompactionFlagCounter

    • writeMemStoreAgainStartCyclicBarrier

      private final CyclicBarrier writeMemStoreAgainStartCyclicBarrier
      Only the snapshot thread retry CompactingMemStore.swapPipelineWithNull(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.VersionedSegmentsList), writeAgain thread could start.

    • writeMemStoreAgainEndCyclicBarrier

      private final CyclicBarrier writeMemStoreAgainEndCyclicBarrier
      This is used for snapshot thread,writeAgain thread and in memory compact thread. Only the writeAgain thread completes, CompactingMemStore.swapPipelineWithNull(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.VersionedSegmentsList) would execute,and in memory compact thread would exit,because we expect that in memory compact executing only once.
